title: Advanced Fulfillment Pipeline Automation & Orchestration

user_stories.description: As a release automation engineer, I want the system to automatically analyze content rights, localize assets, and schedule distribution across multiple regions and platforms (e.g., OTT, FAST, linear broadcast) based on pre-configured business rules so that we minimize operational delays and manual work.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: System ingests asset metadata and dynamically matches distribution rights to platform availability windows
Localization (subtitle, dubs, artwork) is triggered per region/platform policy
Publishing workflow automatically selects correct file profiles, generates delivery packages, and delivers via API/integrations
Delivery status, failures, and retries are logged and can be monitored in real time

user_stories.description: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure every distributed asset is vetted for regulatory compliance (copyright, clearance, local broadcast rules), and an immutable audit trail is created and exportable for external auditors.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Assets must run through compliance and sensitivity flagging (using AI-based moderation tools) with documented human review steps
All rejections and manual overrides logged with user/time/reason
Generate audit report showing asset journey, compliance checks, approvals, and timestamps
Raw logs stored for 6+ years in secure, read-only storage

user_stories.summary: Real-Time Exception Handling and Automated Recovery
user_stories.description: As an operations manager, I want real-time alerts for failed ingest, processing, or delivery tasks, with auto-remediation playbooks and escalation to on-call staff, so content delays are minimized.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: System triggers immediate alerts (Slack, email, SMS) for failed jobs or missed SLAs
Automated retry logic based on failure reason (network, file corruption, etc.)
When retries fail, escalate with incident report containing all diagnostic logs
Dashboard shows all current and historical exception events with statuses

user_stories.summary: Third-Party Partner Integration with Custom SLAs
user_stories.description: As a partner manager, I want each external delivery partner (e.g., Netflix, Amazon, regional OTTs) to have distinct delivery formats, security requirements, and SLA tracking in the pipeline, so we meet contractual obligations.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Configurable profiles for each partner (delivery format, ingest API, security/encryption compliance)
System tracks SLA metrics: delivery time, error rate, confirmation of receipt
SLA breach triggers notifications and root cause analysis workflow
Automated daily/weekly report sent to partner managers

user_stories.description: As an executive, I need a unified dashboard visualizing fulfillment status, trends, partner performance, and anomaly detection (e.g., spikes in errors), to optimize business decisions.

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Dashboard displays fulfillment KPIs (on-time, in-full, error rate) by time, partner, region, and platform
Automated anomaly detection (e.g., via ML model) flags statistically significant deviations in delivery or error rates
Drill-down capability from aggregated metrics to raw ticket/issues/logs
Scheduled export of reports to email/SFTP location

architecture: Microservices Architecture with Event-Driven Processing, Real-time Monitoring, and Multi-Cloud Integration
